# AUDIO::SET_SIREN_BYPASS_MP_DRIVER_CHECK

## Summary
Use in conjuction with SET_SIREN_WITH_NO_DRIVER to definitely play the siren with no driver in MP modes

## Parameters
* **VEHICLE_INDEX** vehicle
* **BOOL** bypass
